question: Will Kali Uchis win the 2025 GLAAD Media Award for Outstanding Music Artist?
reasoning:
Based on the gathered information, Kali Uchis is nominated for the 2025 GLAAD Media Award for Outstanding Music Artist. Other nominees in this category include notable artists such as Billie Eilish, Doechii, Elton John, Adam Lambert, and Victoria Monét. The GLAAD Media Awards evaluate nominees based on fair representation of the LGBT community, cultural impact, boldness and originality, and overall quality.

Given the competition from other well-known artists and the criteria used for evaluation, the probability of Kali Uchis winning the award depends on how her work is perceived in terms of these criteria compared to her competitors.

Considering the presence of strong contenders like Billie Eilish and Elton John, who have significant cultural impact and recognition, the probability of Kali Uchis winning is moderate but not exceedingly high.

FINAL PROBABILITY: 0.25

---
title: Billie Eilish, Doechii & More Nominated for 2025 GLAAD Media Awards: Full List
author: Stephen Daw
url: https://www.billboard.com/culture/pride/billie-eilish-doechii-2025-glaad-awards-nominations-1235880491/
hostname: billboard.com
description: Billie Eilish, Doechii and more artists were nominated for the 2025 GLAAD Media Awards. See the full list here.
sitename: Billboard
date: 2025-01-22
categories: ['Pride']
tags: ['Awards, glaad media awards, pride']
---
With [awards](https://www.billboard.com/t/awards/) season off to a big start in 2025, LGBTQ+ non-profit GLAAD is unveiling its honorees for the 36th annual [GLAAD Media Awards](https://www.billboard.com/t/glaad-media-awards/).

On Wednesday (Jan. 22), GLAAD revealed the [full list of honorees](https://glaad.org/mediaawards/36/nominees/) for the annual award show, including a swath of musical artists earning nominations for their work in 2025. In the outstanding music artist category, GLAAD recognized [Billie Eilish](https://billboard.com/artist/billie-eilish) (*Hit Me Hard and Soft),* [Doechii](https://billboard.com/artist/doechii) *(Alligator Bites Never Heal)* and Elton John (the *Never Too Late* soundtrack) earned nominations for helping “accelerate LGBTQ acceptance” with their music this last year. Reneé Rapp won in 2024 for her work on her debut album *Snow Angel.*

Meanwhile, in the outstanding breakthrough music artist category, up-and-coming acts including Beabadoobee, Gigi Perez, The Last Dinner Party and Remi Wolf earned nominations for their work in 2025. David Archuletta won the award in 2024.

Additionally, two music-related ventures have earned the organization’s special recognition honors; *Drag: The Musical* (co-created by *Drag Race *winner Alaska) and OUTLOUD Music Festival will be recognized alongside Canal Once’s news program *La VerDrag*, The Stonewall National Monument Visitor Center, LatiNation’s *The Q Agenda*, the Public Theater’s *Red Ink: A Tribute to Cecilia Gentili* and the WNBA’s 2024 champions The New York Liberty.

### Trending on Billboard

The 36th annual GLAAD Media Awards are set to take place in Los Angeles on Thursday, March 27. See the full list of nominees below:

### Outstanding Music Artist

- Adam Lambert,
*Afters (More Is More)* - Billie Eilish,
*Hit Me Hard and Soft*(Darkroom/Interscope) - Doechii,
*Alligator Bites Never Heal*(Top Dawg Entertainment/Capitol Records) - Elton John,
*Never Too Late: Soundtrack to the Disney+ Documentary*(UMG Recordi…

search_results.title: https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/2025-glaad-media-awards-nominations-nominees-list-1236114795/
search_results.content:
---
title: GLAAD Media Awards: ‘Wicked,’ ‘Queer,’ The Hollywood Reporter Among Nominees
author: Hilary Lewis
url: https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/2025-glaad-media-awards-nominations-nominees-list-1236114795/
hostname: hollywoodreporter.com
description: The LGBTQ media advocacy organization also shared its nominees in TV, music, Broadway, podcast and video game categories.
sitename: The Hollywood Reporter
date: 2025-01-22
categories: ['Movie News']
tags: ['Awards, GLAAD, GLAAD Media Awards']
---
The 2025 [GLAAD](https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/t/glaad/) Media [Awards](https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/t/awards/) nominations have been revealed.

*Wicked, Queer, Love Lies Bleeding, Mean Girls* and *My Old Ass* are among the nominees in the outstanding film — wide theatrical release category.

Joining those three are *Cuckoo, Drive-Away Dolls* and *Problemista*.

GLAAD, the LGBTQ media advocacy organization, also announced nominees in TV, music, journalism, Broadway and podcast categories.

In the TV categories, notable nominees include comedy nominees *Abbott Elementary, Ghosts, Hacks, Loot, The Sex Lives of College Girls, Shrinking, Somebody Somewhere* and *What We Do in the Shadows*; drama nominees *9-1-1: Lone Star, The Chi, Doctor Who, Found, Interview With the Vampire, Star Trek: Discovery* and *The Umbrella Academy*; new series nominees *Agatha All Along, Black Doves, Brilliant Minds, How to Die Alone, No Good Deed* and *Palm Royale*; and limited or anthology series nominees *Baby Reindeer, Becoming Karl Lagerfeld, Expats, Feud: Capote vs. The Swans, Get Millie Black, Mary & George, The New Look* and *Under the Bridge*.

### Related Stories

Music nominees include Adam Lambert, Billie Eilish, Elton John and Victoria Monét.

*The Hollywood Reporter *was also nominated in the category of outstanding magazine overall coverage.

In a statement, GLAAD CEO Sarah Kate Ellis highlighted the importance of this content amid “attacks against LGBTQ people.”

“The [GLAAD Media Awards](https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/t/glaad-media-awards/) were created nearly four decades ago to champion LGBTQ stories amid a deeply hostile and unsafe time for our community,” she said. “Today, this mission holds true and ever-more important as attacks against LGBTQ people are not only growing, but finding new avenues. Whether it’s rampant misinformation or defamation of transgender people, LGBTQ youth, or the shocking corporate rollback of policies and programs…

The 2025 [GLAAD](https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/t/glaad/) Media [Awards](https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/t/awards/) nominations have been revealed.

*Wicked, Queer, Love Lies Bleeding, Mean Girls* and *My Old Ass* are among the nominees in the outstanding film — wide theatrical release category.

Joining those three are *Cuckoo, Drive-Away Dolls* and *Problemista*.

GLAAD, the LGBTQ media advocacy organization, also announced nominees in TV, music, journalism, Broadway and podcast categories.

In the TV categories, notable nominees include comedy nominees *Abbott Elementary, Ghosts, Hacks, Loot, The Sex Lives of College Girls, Shrinking, Somebody Somewhere* and *What We Do in the Shadows*; drama nominees *9-1-1: Lone Star, The Chi, Doctor Who, Found, Interview With the Vampire, Star Trek: Discovery* and *The Umbrella Academy*; new series nominees *Agatha All Along, Black Doves, Brilliant Minds, How to Die Alone, No Good Deed* and *Palm Royale*; and limited or anthology series nominees *Baby Reindeer, Becoming Karl Lagerfeld, Expats, Feud: Capote vs. The Swans, Get Millie Black, Mary & George, The New Look* and *Under the Bridge*.

### Related Stories

Music nominees include Adam Lambert, Billie Eilish, Elton John and Victoria Monét.

*The Hollywood Reporter *was also nominated in the category of outstanding magazine overall coverage.

In a statement, GLAAD CEO Sarah Kate Ellis highlighted the importance of this content amid “attacks against LGBTQ people.”

“The [GLAAD Media Awards](https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/t/glaad-media-awards/) were created nearly four decades ago to champion LGBTQ stories amid a deeply hostile and unsafe time for our community,” she said. “Today, this mission holds true and ever-more important as attacks against LGBTQ people are not only growing, but finding new avenues. Whether it’s rampant misinformation or defamation of transgender people, LGBTQ youth, or the shocking corporate rollback of policies and programs…

messages.content:
Based on the following question, analyze it carefully and provide your probability estimate.

Question: Will Kali Uchis win the 2025 GLAAD Media Award for Outstanding Music Artist?
Background: According to [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GLAAD_Media_Award), "Honorees are selected by a process involving over 700 GLAAD Media Award voters and volunteers and are evaluated using four criteria: "Fair, Accurate and Inclusive Representations" of the LGBT community, "Boldness and Originality" of the project, significant "Cultural Impact" on mainstream culture, and "Overall Quality" of the project. Results are then certified by a "Review Panel" who determine the final list of recipients based on voting results and their own "expert opinions"."
Resolution criteria: This question resolves as YES if Kali Uchis wins the award for Outstanding Music Artist at the 36th GLAAD Media Awards. This question resolves as NO if any other artist wins the award.
Fine print: 
present_date: 2025-03-20T15:43:34.430131


Make sure to use the tools at your disposal to gather relevant information before providing your final probability estimate.

You may reason through the problem, but you MUST end your response with:
FINAL PROBABILITY: [your decimal number between 0 and 1]

Results are then certified by a \"Review Panel\" who determine the final list of recipients based on voting results and their own \"expert opinions\".\"","resolution_criteria":"This question resolves as YES if Kali Uchis wins the award for Outstanding Music Artist at the 36th GLAAD Media Awards. messages.content:
{"url": "https://www.billboard.com/culture/pride/billie-eilish-doechii-2025-glaad-awards-nominations-1235880491/", "snippet": "---
title: Billie Eilish, Doechii & More Nominated for 2025 GLAAD Media Awards: Full List
author: Stephen Daw
url: https://www.billboard.com/culture/pride/billie-eilish-doechii-2025-glaad-awards-nominations-1235880491/
hostname: billboard.com
description: Billie Eilish, Doechii and more artists were nominated for the 2025 GLAAD Media Awards. See the full list here.
sitename: Billboard
date: 2025-01-22
categories: ['Pride']
tags: ['Awards, glaad media awards, pride']
---
With [awards](https://www.billboard.com/t/awards/) season off to a big start in 2025, LGBTQ+ non-profit GLAAD is unveiling its honorees for the 36th annual [GLAAD Media Awards](https://www.billboard.com/t/glaad-media-awards/).

On Wednesday (Jan. 22), GLAAD revealed the [full list of honorees](https://glaad.org/mediaawards/36/nominees/) for the annual award show, including a swath of musical artists earning nominations for their work in 2025. In the outstanding music artist category, GLAAD recognized [Billie Eilish](https://billboard.com/artist/billie-eilish) (*Hit Me Hard and Soft),* [Doechii](https://billboard.com/artist/doechii) *(Alligator Bites Never Heal)* and Elton John (the *Never Too Late* soundtrack) earned nominations for helping “accelerate LGBTQ acceptance” with their music this last year. Reneé Rapp won in 2024 for her work on her debut album *Snow Angel.*

Meanwhile, in the outstanding breakthrough music artist category, up-and-coming acts including Beabadoobee, Gigi Perez, The Last Dinner Party and Remi Wolf earned nominations for their work in 2025. David Archuletta won the award in 2024.

Additionally, two music-related ventures have earned the organization’s special recognition honors; *Drag: The Musical* (co-created by *Drag Race *winner Alaska) and OUTLOUD Music Festival will be recognized alongside Canal Once’s news program *La VerDrag*, The Stonewall National Monument Visitor Center, LatiNation’s *The Q Agenda*, the Public Theater’s *Red Ink: A Tribute to Cecilia Gentili* and the WNBA’s 2024 champions The New York Liberty.

### Trending on Billboard

The 36th annual GLAAD Media Awards are set to take place in Los Angeles on Thursday, March 27. See the full list of nominees below:

### Outstanding Music Artist

- Adam Lambert,
*Afters (More Is More)* - Billie Eilish,
*Hit Me Hard and Soft*(Darkroom/Interscope) - Doechii,
*Alligator Bites Never Heal*(Top Dawg Entertainment/Capitol Records) - Elton John,
*Never Too Late: Soundtrack to the Disney+ Documentary*(UMG Recordi…

[Truncated preview: showing 330 words out of ~2381. messages.content:
Based on the gathered information, Kali Uchis is nominated for the 2025 GLAAD Media Award for Outstanding Music Artist. Other nominees in this category include notable artists such as Billie Eilish, Doechii, Elton John, Adam Lambert, and Victoria Monét. The GLAAD Media Awards evaluate nominees based on fair representation of the LGBT community, cultural impact, boldness and originality, and overall quality.

Given the competition from other well-known artists and the criteria used for evaluation, the probability of Kali Uchis winning the award depends on how her work is perceived in terms of these criteria compared to her competitors.

Considering the presence of strong contenders like Billie Eilish and Elton John, who have significant cultural impact and recognition, the probability of Kali Uchis winning is moderate but not exceedingly high.

FINAL PROBABILITY: 0.25
